title: Teaching Her, Pleasing Them
description: Cassie has a small problem; she's never given a blow job before and it's putting some stress on her relationship with Brad. Her best friend Angie has a plan and with her husband, Dale's help, she plans on teaching Cassie everything she knows right in their living room with all members present. EXPLICIT SEX! ADULTS ONLY!!!Show More Show Less
author: Chase Boehner
